inclusion.criterion: co-participating parent/guardian and child is obtained
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: will receive verbal and written information on all aspects of the study prior to consent for participation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Sample size calculations were performed with G*Power 3.1.9.2
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: The a priori sample size calculation was based on the treatment effects on children's pain-related fear memories in the study of Pickrell et al. (2007)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: targeting a study power of (80%) with α=0.05
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Allocation ratio (N2/N1) was defined as 1, resulting in 47 patients in the experimental group and 47 in the control group (n=94 for the total sample size)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Accounting for a 10% dropout and keeping in mind that every sample size calculation has its limitations
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: the investigators propose studying at least 52 patients per group for this study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hence, the total number of participants to be included will be equal to 104
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Because of the low number of new cases of childhood cancer (<15 years of age) per year in Belgium (2)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: the monocentric nature of this trial and the limited time for data collection (1 year 9 months)
inclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of hypercholesterolemia and two C/sections. She is menopausal and has 2 children. She doesn't smoke, drink alcohol, or use illicit drugs.
